oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial Photograph of Municipal Auditorium, c.1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of the newly-completed Municipal Auditorium, located at 417 4th Avenue North. The facility was designed by Marr & Holman architects and opened in October of 1962. The structure has three levels with a seat capacity of approximately 10,000 people. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
